title: Sold T206 Cobb Green Background PSA A

posts.post_title: Sold T206 Cobb Green Background PSA A
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Cobb Green background. Card has had the top border trimmed off but otherwise presents a solid vg-ex on the front. Back has a small part of paper loss on the back. Great card outside of the haircut. sold Please PM or email [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] for questions or to confirm.

Thanks

Chris
Bump - shoot me an offer - trades welcomed as well.
